class

build::JarDist

sys::Obj
  build::Task
    build::JdkTask
      build::JarDist

JarDist compiles a set of Fantom pods into a single Java JAR file.

mainMethodSource

Str? mainMethod

Qualified name of main method to run for JAR. This must be a static void method with no arguments.
